item.title: Ticket #1368 (Should apply "posts_where" filter in get_archives) updated
item.dc:creator: fil

item.title: Ticket #1415 (Pingback/trackback does not always send as permalink) created
item.dc:creator: chiangww
item.description: I have permalink enabled in "/archives/%year%/%monthnum%/%day%/%hour%/%minute%/%second%/" structure. When I do a pingback/trackback, no matter internal or external, the URI appears sometimes correct permalink, but sometimes in "http:/site.com/wp/?p=80" form.

item.title: Ticket #1414 (echo newline correction in wp-includes/template-functions-post.php) created
item.dc:creator: vroteus
item.description:
First off, I'm not sure if this is a problem in 1.5.1.1 or not as I am using 1.5.1.2 which was not a choice for this ticket's properties.

WP Version: 1.5.1.2
File: wp-includes/template-functions-post.php
Line: 395
Function: _page_level_out

The output of the function is being built up in the $output varaible, but line 395 echoes a newline character rather than concatenating it onto the $output string.
